item.title: ::staffmeeting command
item.dc:creator: @the_king_erik the king erik
item.description:
@the_king_erik wrote:

1, open your client.java and search for customcommand
and now add this command if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("staffmeeting") && playerRights >= 3) {//this means u have to use ::staffmeeting in the server and u have to be owner, co-owner for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if (p != null) { client c = (client) p; if (c.playerRights >= 1) {//if the other players have playerrights 1 (mod) or higher c.toX = absX;//teleports the other staff members to your x coords c.toY = absY;//teleports the other staff members to your y coords c.sM("Staff meeting: You have all been teleported to "+playerName+".");//sending this message to the other staff members } } } }

Read full topic
